after.title: Phase 5: Implement project status updates
after.body:
Add support for setting project status and fields on issues/PRs.

## Tasks
- [ ] Add --status option to issue/pr commands
- [ ] Add --set-field key=value option
- [ ] Add GhClient methods for project field operations
- [ ] Handle auto-detection of project from issue
- [ ] Support --project flag for explicit project selection

after.title: Phase 6: Implement shortcuts (--start, --done)
after.body:
Add convenience shortcuts for common operations.

## Tasks
- [ ] Add --start shortcut = --status 'In Progress' --add-assignees @me
- [ ] Add --done shortcut = --close --status 'Done'
- [ ] Make shortcuts configurable via .ght/config.yml (future)

after.title: Phase 7: Implement unified search
after.body:
Add unified search command for issues and PRs.

## Tasks
- [ ] Implement ght search "query" command
- [ ] Add --type issue|pr filter

after.title: Phase 8: Configuration support (.ght/config.yml)
after.body:
Add support for .ght/config.yml configuration file.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create config loading/parsing module
- [ ] Configurable blocked indicators (labels, statuses)
- [ ] Configurable dependency section header
- [ ] Configurable shortcuts (--start, --done)
